Keywords: Detective , Justice League , Justice League International , Outsiders , Police
Real Name: John Jones
Team Up
1
TEAM UP: DETECTIVE THEMED TEAM: If Martian Manhunter is part of the listed themed team, standard friendly characters that share a keyword with him have Outsiders team ability.
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Blocking, Characters
PSYCHIC DETECTIVE: When Martian Manhunter uses Outsiders team ability and targets an opposing character, that character can't be given FREE actions until your next turn.
DETECTIVE JOHN JONES, DENVER P.D.: Opposing characters can't target Martian Manhunter unless he has made an attack this game. // At the beginning of your turn, you may deal Martian Manhunter 1 unavoidable damage.

Comments
January 8, 2023
thugit
Played him today, and it’s definitely the most effective Martian Manhunter ever made. He was an amazing tie-up and support figure to start, and then becomes a very solid brick once he takes that click and “reveals” himself. The combination of Perplex, Outsiders TA, and shutting down free actions is superb. Easily one of the best figures in the set, and the best J’onn ever.
